channel.title: aina on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in aina on Barefoot Rob

item.title: Met Aina
item.description: 18:01 Monday 06 April 2015 JST Met a young woman named Aina (愛奈) today while wandering around Akihabara taking some video for a guy on Fiverr. She approached me with a small pamphlet, and I had time to spend chatting so I said HI. She said we can go on a date, and I resisted teasing her, “oh so you’ll be my girlfriend?” and asked what kind of date? Like go to dinner or karaoke.
